## blockRendering.IPathObject interface

An interface for a block's path object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IPathObject 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [constants](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.constants.md) | ConstantProvider | The renderer's constant provider. |
|  [cursorSvg](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.cursorsvg.md) | SVGElement | Holds the cursors SVG element when the cursor is attached to the block. This is null if there is no cursor on the block. |
|  [markerSvg](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.markersvg.md) | SVGElement | Holds the markers SVG element when the marker is attached to the block. This is null if there is no marker on the block. |
|  [style](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.style.md) | BlockStyle | The primary path of the block. |
|  [svgPath](./blockly.blockrendering.ipathobject.svgpath.md) | SVGElement | The primary path of the block. |
